attributes.action: THE JACK ALLEN PETITION! JACK TOOK HIS OWN LIFE. ALL I WANT IS ACCESS TO HIS PHOTOS ON HIS FACEBOOK ACCOUNT.ALL I WANT IS TO SEE THEM
attributes.additional_details: I WANT THE GOVERMENT TO GET FACEBOOK TO CHANGE THE WAY THEY OPERATE IN REGARDS TO A DECEASED CHILDS ACCOUNT.A PARENT CAN VIEW A MOBILE BUT NOT FACEBOOK. WHY ? ALL I WANT IS TO VIEW MY LATE SONS PHOTOS, NOT HIS CONVERSATIONS, WHICH ARE PRIVATE. THIS ISSUE NEEDS TO BE ADRESSED. I AM SURE THERE ARE TREASURED PHOTOS OF MY SON ON THAT ACCOUNT, ALL I WANT TO DO IS SEE THEM. IT'S A PART OF HIM THAT IS NOW MISSING. MY 16 YEAR OLD TOOK HIS OWN LIFE. I AM SURE THERE ARE OTHER PARENTS/ GRANDPARENTS IN THE SAME SITUATION AS WE ARE. PLEASE HELP ! THE LAW NEEDS CHANGING. THANK YOU.
